long_description: As easy to use as it is tough, the compact, lightweight Gerber MP1 Multitool makes quick work of light or heavy tasks. It delivers the components you need in a distinctive butterfly design. High-quality forged jaws are spring-loaded and stronger than cast versions; butterfly-style opening is easy to use. Large serrated blade and large fine-edge blade feature high-grade 420 HC stainless steel. Utility blade is the perfect implement for rough work and scraping surfaces that might damage the fine-edge blade. Multipurpose plier jaws are forged from 6150 carbon steel; they include wire strippers and diagonal cutters for electrical projects. Magnetic bit driver features a #2 Phillips for all-around versatility, but can be used with any bit; large and small flat screwdrivers handle your straight-slot screw needs. Extra-thick pry bar is thicker than the other components and is tough enough for heavy-duty use; pry bar doubles as a bottle opener. The Gerber MP1 Multitool features a wedge lock for all components, glass-filled nylon handle and a polyester sheath.
short_description: As easy to use as it is tough, the compact, lightweight Gerber MP1 Multitool makes quick work of light or heavy tasks. It delivers the components you need in a distinctive butterfly design.
